trans-unit.source: Drop your Jupyter notebook in the Pelican content directory, build your site, and deploy! :rocket:
trans-unit.target: 把你的Jupyter笔记本丢到Pelican内容目录下,建站,部署! :火箭。

trans-unit.source: For example, to use the basic template for the HTMLExporter, you could add the following to your pelicanconf.py:
trans-unit.target: For example, to use the basic template for the HTMLExporter , you could add the following to your pelicanconf.py :

trans-unit.source: Other nbconvert configuration options can be found here.
trans-unit.target: Other nbconvert configuration options can be found here.

trans-unit.source: Provide Pelican post metadata as a top-level object with key pelican in the Jupyter notebook metadata:
trans-unit.target: Provide Pelican post metadata as a top-level object with key pelican in the Jupyter notebook metadata:

trans-unit.source: The demo/ directory has a simple post with corresponding configuration in pelicanconf.py. The demo site is deployed here.
trans-unit.target: The demo/ directory has a simple post with corresponding configuration in pelicanconf.py . The demo site is deployed here.

trans-unit.source: The Jupyter nbconvert configuration for preprocessors and the HTMLExporter are exposed in your Pelican config, pelicanconf.py. This means you can manipulate notebooks with utilities provided by nbconvert.
trans-unit.target: The Jupyter nbconvert configuration for preprocessors and the HTMLExporter are exposed in your Pelican config, pelicanconf.py . This means you can manipulate notebooks with utilities provided by nbconvert .

trans-unit.source: This Pelican plugin provides a Jupyter Notebook (i.e. *.ipynb) reader. The plugin intends to allow users to simply drop Jupyter notebooks in their Pelican content directory and have the notebooks rendered (beautifully) in a Pelican static website.
trans-unit.target: This Pelican plugin provides a Jupyter Notebook (i.e. *.ipynb ) reader. The plugin intends to allow users to simply drop Jupyter notebooks in their Pelican content directory and have the notebooks rendered (beautifully) in a Pelican static website.

trans-unit.source: This plugin can be installed via:
trans-unit.target: 这个插件可以通过安装。

trans-unit.source: To strip empty cells from the notebook before publishing, you might add this option to pelicanconf.py:
trans-unit.target: To strip empty cells from the notebook before publishing, you might add this option to pelicanconf.py :
